alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:46AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Grady and east central Caddo Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 646 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Chickasha, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chickasha, Blanchard, Anadarko, Tuttle, Minco, Alex, Verden, Amber, Bridge Creek, Pocasset, Norge, Bradley, Middleberg, Tabler, Lake Chickasha and Ninnekah. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 76 and 101. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm! Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
